text: Creates shockwave on charge, disrupting enemy formation.
Freezes enemy to the ground, rooting them.
Can protect area with active ability against missiles.
Ice constructs are, by their nature, vulnerable to fire[[img:ui/skins/default/modifier_icon_flaming.png]][[/img]].
Ice armour provides excellent protection against all types of damage, except fire[[img:ui/skins/default/modifier_icon_flaming.png]][[/img]].
